task.title: Uninstall a Game
task.shortdesc: If you no longer play a game and want to remove it from your computer, you can uninstall it.

step.cmd: In the left panel, right-click the game you'd like to uninstall.
Read the warning pop-up and, if you wish to continue, click Uninstall again. The process may take a few seconds to complete depending on the size of the game.
